StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: proc_markcard_std_ranking
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE proc_markcard_std_ranking ( p_school_code IN VARCHAR2, p_batch_no IN DATE, p_class_code IN VARCHAR2, p_term_code IN VARCHAR2, p_student_id IN VARCHAR2, p_std_percentage IN OUT VARCHAR2, p_std_rank IN OUT VARCHAR2 ) AS ---cursor student ranking CURSOR cur_std_ranking ( pp_school_code VARCHAR2, pp_batch_no DATE, pp_class_code VARCHAR2, pp_term_code VARCHAR2, pp_student_id VARCHAR2 ) IS SELECT percentage, ( CASE WHEN overall_status = 'PASSED' THEN func_num_ordinal(ranking) ELSE NULL END ) AS ranking FROM mv_std_ranking WHERE school_code = pp_school_code AND batch_no = pp_batch_no AND class_code = pp_class_code AND term_code = pp_term_code AND student_id = pp_student_id; BEGIN OPEN cur_std_ranking( pp_school_code => p_school_code, pp_batch_no => p_batch_no, pp_class_code => p_class_code, pp_term_code => p_term_code, pp_student_id => p_student_id ); FETCH cur_std_ranking INTO p_std_percentage, p_std_rank; CLOSE cur_std_ranking; END;
